item.title: Brief tour of Banki turbine hydro system
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_xn1cz3F4Q0 Built from scrap steel and using home-brew electronics, this hydro-turbine generates a steady 500W at 240VAC all winter long. http://pdf.usaid.gov/pdf_docs/PNAAP285.pdf
